The orb spins and a massive blast of Chaochitan rises behind 
Blacknightmare threatening to wipe her from existance if she did not 
run to the end of the path.

Ball: "You are inccorect, none of these answers are correct, the is 
no one single cause for war, it is a mixture of many factors that 
does."

--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Blacknightmare::
> 
> "Do you like that I support my answer?"said Blacknightmare without 
> emotion"I will do it: fear isn't motivation, fear freeze you and it 
> does that you can't see the way to reach your goals; Hate and 
greed, 
> is most the cause of wars, but mosth Greed than Hate: Hate is the 
> motivation not the cause... But Greed... "
> 
> Stopped the femme for a sec.
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Legendarynemasis@a... wrote:
> > As Blacknightmare stepped onto the right oath the orb began to 
glow 
> a

> >

> > >

> > > > could not here Darkfate, see him, or sense him. Back inside 
the 
> > > room 
> > > > the ball spins around and begins to glow yellow.
> > > >

> > > before 
> > > > you represent a cause for war. The path to the left signifies

> > > > the path to the right, greed, the one in the center signifies 
> > fear. 
> > > > Which Blacknightmare of these three causes is the true cause 
of 
> > > war? 
> > > > When you have selected your answer step onto its path."
> > > >

> > > > >

and

which

> > > > kind.

three 
> > > paths 
> > > > > were 
> > > > > > lit up on the floor.

Pass
